FuncDef:
The flow-aggregation export interval command configures the interval for reporting aggregation flow entries.
The undo flow-aggregation export interval command restores the default interval for reporting aggregation flow entries. The flow-aggregation export interval command configures the interval for reporting aggregation flow entries. The undo flow-aggregation export interval command restores the default interval for reporting aggregation flow entries. By default, the interval for reporting aggregation flow entries is 300s. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the interval for reporting aggregation flow entries.
The value is an integer that ranges from 10 to 1800,in seconds. The default value is 300.
